title: Riot will we ever get to see Varus as a Full Darkin one day?
body:
[](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/varus_bio_t2.jpg)

https://media.giphy.com/media/paWgBtUVmqmDlcPOLC/giphy.gif

We all know that he recently merged the two bodies of Valmar and Kai to create a new body which he is still battling for control. But once he takes full control and enough time passes, he will begin to change and begin to look somewhat familiar alongside the other Darkin...

https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2Fq1Fd0WK.png%3Fnoredirect&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150, {{champion:266}}

Thing is we still don't know what {{champion:110}}  looked like before and after becoming a Darkin, because his current appearance in most skins is now based of 2 people from the merge. Even in the 'As We Fall' Video and the comics, Varus looks at himself and he isn't sure what he is, what he was before, and so on... 

###So I am just wondering will we ever see Varus at full power, as a full Darkin like his brethren https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2Fq1Fd0WK.png%3Fnoredirect&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150, {{champion:266}}? Even as a new skin if need be...?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Darkin Hybrid,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Fhq2gvKv,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-16T13:18:20.687+0000)
>
> But once he takes full control and enough time passes

It won't happen because that's not how League's timeline works. All the events you're experiecing in the lore all happen at, relatively, the same time. For example, the new Aspects being chosen, Aurelion returning to Runeterra and Azir resurrection. All that happens in succession and near each other.
LIke you said, Varus was freed recently. You won't see him take full control for a long time, because of how League's timeline works. Time is "still".

***
> [{quoted}](name=Darkin Hybrid,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Fhq2gvKv,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-16T13:18:20.687+0000)
>
> he will begin to change and begin to look somewhat familiar alongside the other Darkin...

Not necessarily. It baffles me why people assume Aatrox and Rhaast are the norm. Let's not forget 5 other darkin exist. Rhaast and Aatrox are only 2/5 of them. Why assume they are the norm and not the exception?
Besides, Varus is different. While Aatrox and Rhaast took possession of **one** mortal body, Varus **crafted** his body using **two**. We don't know the limitations of their magic (blood magic). All we know is their form isn't exactly how they looked like before, at least for Aatrox's case.
***
> [{quoted}](name=Darkin Hybrid,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Fhq2gvKv,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-16T13:18:20.687+0000)
>
> So I am just wondering will we ever see Varus at full power, as a full Darkin like his brethren 

If anything, Varus is **more** powerful than both those guys, lore wise in the current events of the timeline.
Rhaast hasn't taken full control over Kayn's body.
Aatrox is looking for a new host because his current body is weak and "dying".
Varus literally crafted his body recently and that's the pivotal point. Because he used two bodies and not one, his power should be way above any of the other four (unless a similar process was used or the host is a particularly powerful entity).

Finally, neither of them will ever come close to their brethren full power. Why? Because darkin are cursed Ascended people. The other dozens of Darkin were destroyed and the 5 that remain will never be at full power again.
###### Unless they find a way to break the spell. Maybe on another universe ;)

Correction, Aatrox's form is comprised of many flesh bags not just one like you've claimed. 

Also Rhaast's in-game design is entirely in the context of a "what if" the Darkin reached full potential. But beyond it's visual we have zero context behind how Rhaast could manage to achieve that exact look. Possible Kayn's fully absorbed flesh still wouldn't produce that exact same Darkin form we see in-game. If Aatrox needs multiple people to reach some semblance of true form, wouldn't Rhaast (and Varus) have to do the same?
I think it'd be fun if it were a legendary skin where he was the full darkin.

Yeah sounds interesting. I was looking online earlier and the only artwork I managed to find on Varus being a full Darkin is this, but it's not exactly high quality example...

https://preview.ibb.co/m2ozaL/lol-darkin-varus-by-tipsyepsy-dc4vvsj.jpg

I personally don't find it that impressive, his head crystal is a emphasised too much and some parts of him are too Aatrox alike.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Rhinark,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Fhq2gvKv,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-11-16T14:05:04.797+0000)
>
> Why is he purple?

Because Riot doesnt want to change his art. Darkin are not all red either. Only 2 out of 5 are red.

They wanna keep Varus as he is known. Otherwise he'd be a completely different character so even if his lore changed they wanna keep that part.
Something to do with the idea of him just getting a new body, so it will corrupt in time becoming more red like, similar to Aatrox and Rhaast.
Definitely needs to be a potential skin. His skins are a little too bland for me, except for Conqueror.
should be a legendary skin tbh

I figured from the video it was he was this random (ghost? Thought? Something?) That was given form due to the dieing soul (due to it coming out of his body pretty much) and then ended up fusing them both because neither body was strong enough to make it on their own anymore.

I keep forgetting that hes a darkin.

https://image.ibb.co/chk99f/chrome-2018-11-16-13-40-16.png

He's still defined as a "Darkin Hybrid" before and after the lore rework in his description (based on LoLWiki). So the fact that my LoL Name makes sense gives me some form of relief lol.

Also in the video, that was his spectral form.

Yeah, but just saying my thought on it.... would be interesting to have two skins possibly.... one a darkin varus, and one that is the human form left over if the darkin left (if thats possible?)

Or atleast just darkin Varus. Otherwise he will probably never be seen as a darkin or even part.

OH! They could do what they did with gangplank.... be disabled or something for a bit then reappear as a full darkin? Not sure.... kinda interesting to think about.
Of course is the answer to your question. League is an ever evolving game that affects the background stories of its lore. Yes, it is possible that we may see varus as a full darkin.
